summary: An email from a law firm representing an Epstein victim to an FBI contact, requesting transcripts or police records of a witness statement given to the FBI on July 14, 2019. The email indicates the victim's attorney was directed to the recipient by a detective.

persons.name: Ms.
persons.context: The recipient of the email, an FBI contact to whom the request for witness statement transcripts or police records is directed.

persons.name: Detective
persons.context: A detective who directed the sender to the FBI contact for obtaining records of a witness statement.

connections.description: The detective directed the email sender to contact Ms. at the FBI to obtain records.

events.title: Victim gives witness statement to FBI
events.description: An Epstein victim provided a witness statement to the FBI.

events.title: Attorney requests witness statement records
events.description: An attorney from The Bloom Firm emails the FBI to request transcripts or police records of a victim's July 14, 2019 witness statement.

keyFacts: The Bloom Firm represents an Epstein victim who gave a witness statement to the FBI on July 14, 2019.
A detective directed the victim's attorney to contact a specific FBI contact (Ms.) to obtain transcripts or police records of that statement.
The email is a formal request for records, indicating ongoing legal proceedings or investigations related to victim testimony.
